name: ai-call-handler-enterprise-cloudflare
description: Enterprise-grade AI Call Handler for Cloudflare Workers - Supports 200K+ concurrent calls

scripts.kv:create: wrangler kv:namespace create RATE_LIMIT_KV && wrangler kv:namespace create CACHE_KV
scripts.secret:set: wrangler secret put OPENAI_API_KEY && wrangler secret put SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
